name: ruby2js-selfhost
description: Self-hosted Ruby2JS converter running in Node.js

scripts.build: npm run build:walker && npm run build:converter && npm run build:spec
scripts.build:walker: bundle exec ruby -I../../lib -rruby2js -rruby2js/filter/require -rruby2js/filter/combiner -rruby2js/filter/pragma -rruby2js/filter/selfhost_walker -rruby2js/filter/functions -rruby2js/filter/esm -e "puts Ruby2JS.convert(File.read('../../lib/ruby2js/prism_walker.rb'), eslevel: 2022, underscored_private: true, file: '../../lib/ruby2js/prism_walker.rb', filters: [Ruby2JS::Filter::Pragma, Ruby2JS::Filter::Require, Ruby2JS::Filter::Combiner, Ruby2JS::Filter::SelfhostWalker, Ruby2JS::Filter::Functions, Ruby2JS::Filter::ESM])" > dist/walker.mjs

author: Sam Ruby
